content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5) (working, connected to pipe network)
- Boiler at (-6.0, 1.5) (working, contains coal)
- Steam engine at (-1.5, 4.5) (now WORKING, connected to pipe network)
- Pipe network connecting all components (fluid system 1398 for water, 1399 for steam)

### Iron Production Facility at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at (15.5, 70.5) (now WORKING, extracting iron ore)
- Wooden chest at (15.5, 72.5) containing 91 iron ore
- Inserter at (16.5, 72.5) (WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION)
- Stone furnace at (18.0, 73.0) (status: WORKING, producing iron plates)
- Assembling machine 2 at (20.5, 73.5) (status: NO_POWER)
- Input inserter at (19.5, 73.5) (WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS)
- Small electric poles throughout the area (now powered, voltage: 404506)

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent power connection issues (improved but still present)
- Assembling machine remains without power despite network improvements
- Verify all power pole connections reach all production buildings

### Entity placement distance errors (recurring)
- Attempted to place inserter from 75 tiles away (move within 10 tiles first)
- Boiler placement failed due to distance/terrain (verify position is land and accessible)

### Pipe connection failures (new)
- Multiple pipe connection attempts failed between boiler and steam engine
- Verify pipe path is clear and connection points are unobstructed
- Check fluid directionality when connecting pipes

### Entity collision errors (recurring)
- Attempted to place pipe where one already exists (remove existing first)
- Boiler placement blocked by terrain/water (scan area before placement)

### Belt connection issues (new)
- Failed to connect transport belts due to invalid path length
- Verify belt endpoints align properly before connection attempts

### Entity access errors (new)
- Attempted to access non-existent furnace (verify entity exists before operations)
- When rebuilding structures, confirm old entities are removed first

### Inserter operation issues (persistent)
- Output inserter still blocked (clear output area)
- Input inserter waiting for items (verify source inventory and belt connections)

### Fluid system warnings
- Steam engine now operational but monitor fluid levels
- Maintain coal supply to boiler to prevent steam production interruptions
